text: Dude, I took a degree in Philosophy.  The Vervaeke conversation comes as easily.  Along those lines, when I was a wee undergrad, I spent a week following John Searle around.  There's a fun symmetry here.  That was about twenty years ago, and about forty years ago is when he came up with the Chinese room thought experiment.  Well, it's not a hypothetical anymore!
